pkgmetadata.longdescription: Makes 'R' Easier for 'SAS' Programmers // A meta-package that aims to make 'R' easier for 'SAS' programmers. This set of packages brings many familiar concepts to 'R', including data libraries, data dictionaries, formats and format catalogs, a data step, and a traceable log. The 'flagship' package is a reporting package that can output in text, rich text, and 'PDF' file formats.
